Package model

Class BranchDataManager

java.lang.Object
model.BranchDataManager
public class BranchDataManager extends Object
The BranchDataManager handles the interaction between the application and the database. It is responsible for reading and writing data to the database textfiles.

    • loadStaff

      public static List<EmployeeHandler> loadStaff()
      Loads the employee from the staff textfile and categorizes them based on their roles. Returns a list of role categories with corresponding employees.
      Returns:
      The list of EmployeeHandler objects categories into roles
